mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.name, a.location, a.image1_name AS image1Name FROM payments p INNER JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE a.host_id = #{hostId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( guest_id, accommodation_id, check_in, check_out, pay_amount, pay_status, pay_means, imp_uid, create_day ) VALUES ( #{guestId}, #{accommodationId}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{payAmount}, #{payStatus}, #{payMeans}, #{impUid}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, a.name, a.location, a.image1_name AS image1Name FROM payments p JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.guest_id = #{guestId} AND p.pay_status = '완료'
SELECT p.*, a.name, a.location, a.image1_name AS image1Name FROM payments p JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.accommodation_id = #{accommodationId}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pay_amount), 0) FROM payments WHERE pay_status = '완료' AND ( (YEAR(check_in) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(check_in) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())) OR (YEAR(check_out) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) AND MONTH(check_out) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE())) )
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE pay_status = '완료' AND check_in > CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM payments WHERE DATE(check_in) = CURRENT_DATE AND pay_status = '완료'

SELECT p.*, u.name AS user_name, a.name AS name FROM Payments p JOIN Users u ON p.guest_id = u.user_id JOIN Accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.check_in BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND p.pay_status = '완료' ORDER BY p.check_in ASC

SELECT p.accommodation_id, COUNT(*) AS reservations_count, a.name, a.location, a.image1_name AS image1Name FROM payments p JOIN accommodations a ON p.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE p.pay_status = '완료' AND MONTH(p.check_in) = MONTH(CURRENT_DATE()) AND YEAR(p.check_in) = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE()) GROUP BY p.accommodation_id ORDER BY reservations_count DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(ANY_VALUE(check_in)), '년 ', MONTH(ANY_VALUE(check_in)), '월') AS month, -- check_in에 ANY_VALUE() 적용 SUM(pay_amount) AS total FROM payments WHERE pay_status = '완료' AND check_in >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 6 MONTH) GROUP BY YEAR(check_in), MONTH(check_in) ORDER BY YEAR(check_in) ASC, MONTH(check_in) ASC;
